articles.description: The NSW Swifts, Adelaide Thunderbirds, Melbourne Vixens and Collingwood Magpies escape to Brisbane after being told they could not play or train, but the Giants and Swifts coach Briony Akle are left behind due to links to exposure sites.
articles.content:
Four Super Netball clubs have been relocated to Brisbane from Adelaide as South Australia goes into a seven-day lockdown.
